title: Nespresso Capsules Vertuo, Variety Pack
how_to_use: Insert a capsule into your Vertuo machine and brew according to your preferred size.
bonus_tip: Use filtered water to enhance the flavor of each blend.
good_for: Coffee lovers who enjoy a mix of dark and medium roasts.

title: Sparkle Pick-A-Size Paper Towels
how_to_use: Tear a sheet as needed and use for cleaning, wiping, or absorbing spills.
bonus_tip: Store in a dry place to keep towels fresh and strong.

title: Owala FreeSip Insulated Water Bottle
how_to_use: Fill with your favorite beverage, lock lid, and sip through FreeSip straw.
bonus_tip: Hand wash the lid and straw regularly to maintain hygiene.
good_for: Active people, gym-goers, or anyone needing hydration on the go.

title: Protective Cover with Hard PC Translucent Back
how_to_use: Snap your device into the cover ensuring all corners are secure.
bonus_tip: Clean the case regularly with a damp cloth to keep it clear.
good_for: iPad users wanting durable protection and a sleek look.
